name: Justimon Blitz Arm
effect: [When Digivolving] Activate 1 of the effects below. ・This Digimon gets +2000 DP for the turn. ・Unsuspend this Digimon. ・Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 5 or less.[When Attacking][Once Per Turn] For each Tamer you have in play, activate this Digimon's [When Digivolving] effect.
